body_html: Can we check if there are any hooks? My guess is they are empty most of the time, and we should optimize for that case. It will become important with the JIT not to have the autograd hold input variables if they will be unused. If there are hooks, my guess that copying the input list to preserve them would not be that expensive since hooks are not universal.

body: Can we check if there are any hooks? My guess is they are empty most of the time, and we should optimize for that case. It will become important with the JIT not to have the autograd hold input variables if they will be unused. If there are hooks, my guess that copying the input list to preserve them would not be that expensive since hooks are not universal.
